sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. of poisonous substances left on herbs and trees by all types of poisonous bugs/snakes/insects. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 25: 治因瘡腫痛劇者，數日死；或中風寒，或中 水，或中狐尿刺主之方 , “To cure those who experience excruciatingly painful sores and swelling and will die within a few days. Apply recipes that help control being struck by wind cold, by water, and by fox urine piercing .

② Pathological Condition identical with hu niao ci zhuang 狐尿刺瘡 . Qian jin yi fang 千金翼方 20: 諸螳螂之類， 盛暑之時多有孕育，著諸物上，必有精汁，其汁乾久則有毒，人手觸之 不王相之間，則成其疾，名曰狐尿刺，日夜磣痛，不識眠睡 , 百方治之不 瘥 , “When they breed at the time of abounding summerheat, all types of mantis attach themselves to various items, where they leave their sperm liquid. When this liquid has dried for some time it will be poisonous. When someone touches it with his hand he will develop this ailment without noticing it. It is called ‘ fox urine piercing’ . A gritty pain is felt day and night, and one cannot sleep”.
